name: Insights - Executive View (v3 Oct 2025)
description: New lookup based KPI dashboard, Uses new Oct 2025 lookup with valid MTTResp
title: Insights - Executive View (v3 Oct 2025)

panels.title: Insights by Month and Severity Last {{days}} days

queries.queryString:
cat {{{lookup}}}
| where createdtime > (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * {{days}}))
| formatdate(tolong(createdtime),"yyyy-MM") as month
// severity used to be numeric but now it's not
| concat(severity,"-",severityname) as severity

| count by month,severity 


| transpose row month column severity

panels.title: MTTR:  Response and Resolution Last {{days}} days

queries.queryString:
cat {{{lookup}}}
| where createdtime > (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * {{days}}))
| formatdate(tolong(createdtime),"yyyy-MM") as month
| where status= "closed"
| if(resolution = "False Positive", 1, 0) as fp_count
| if(resolution = "No Action",1,0) as no_act_count
| 1 as _row
| count as insights,avg(confidence) as confidence_score,sum(fp_count) as fp_count,sum(no_act_count) as no_act_count by month
| 100 * (fp_count/insights) as fp_ratio
| 100 * (no_act_count/insights) as no_action_rato
| sum(insights) as insights //,avg(fp_ratio) as fp_ratio ,avg(no_action_rato) as no_action_rato 
by month
| order by month asc

panels.title: Cloud SIEM Executive KPI
panels.text:
This is an executive KPI view of Insights generated in Cloud SIEM Enterprise (CSE). It uses a **lookup table updated via a scheduled search every 15m**: {{{lookup}}}.

Since the lookup table is a fixed current state view of last insight state you must use the **days** param to scope time ranges for queries. Some panels have a fixed range.

queries.queryString:
cat {{{lookup}}}
| where createdtime > (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 30))
| formatdate(tolong(createdtime),"yyyy-MM") as month


| count as insights by resolution
| if(resolution  IN ("No Action"),insights,0) as fp
| sum(fp) as fp, sum(insights) as insights | 100 * (fp/insights) as fp_ratio | fields fp_ratio

panels.title: False Positive and No Action History Last {{days}} days

queries.queryString:
cat {{{lookup}}}
| where createdtime > (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * {{days}}))
| formatdate(tolong(createdtime),"yyyy-MM") as month
| where status= "closed"
| if(resolution = "False Positive", 1, 0) as fp_count
| if(resolution = "No Action",1,0) as no_act_count
| 1 as _row
| count as insights,avg(confidence) as confidence_score,sum(fp_count) as fp_count,sum(no_act_count) as no_act_count by month
| 100 * (fp_count/insights) as fp_ratio
| 100 * (no_act_count/insights) as no_action_rato
| avg(fp_ratio) as %"False_Positive" ,avg(no_action_rato) as %"No Action" by month
| 100 - (%"False_Positive" + %"No Action") as other
| order by month asc

cat {{{lookup}}}
| where createdtime > (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 90)) and  createdtime < (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 60)) 

| count as insights by resolution
| if(resolution  IN ("False Positive","Duplicate"),insights,0) as fp
| sum(fp) as fp, sum(insights) as insights | 100 * (fp/insights) as fp_ratio | fields fp_ratio

cat {{{lookup}}}
| where createdtime > (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 90)) and  createdtime < (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 60)) 
| count as insights by resolution
| if(resolution  IN ("No Action"),insights,0) as fp
| sum(fp) as fp, sum(insights) as insights | 100 * (fp/insights) as fp_ratio | fields fp_ratio

cat {{{lookup}}}
| where createdtime > (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 60)) and  createdtime < (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 30)) 

| count as insights by resolution
| if(resolution  IN ("False Positive","Duplicate"),insights,0) as fp
| sum(fp) as fp, sum(insights) as insights | 100 * (fp/insights) as fp_ratio | fields fp_ratio

cat {{{lookup}}}
| where createdtime > (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 60)) and  createdtime < (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 30)) 

| count as insights by resolution
| if(resolution  IN ("No Action"),insights,0) as fp
| sum(fp) as fp, sum(insights) as insights | 100 * (fp/insights) as fp_ratio | fields fp_ratio

cat {{{lookup}}}
| where createdtime > (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * {{days}}))
| tolong(createdtime) as _messagetime
| timeslice by 1w 
//| timeToDetection / 3600 as timeToDetection
| timeToDetection as s
| pct(s,25,50,75) , min(s), max(s) by _timeslice

cat {{{lookup}}}
| where createdtime > (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * {{days}}))
| tolong(createdtime) as _messagetime
| timeslice by 1w 
//| timeToDetection / 3600 as timeToDetection
| timetoresponse as s
| pct(s,25,50,75) , min(s), max(s) by _timeslice

cat {{{lookup}}}
| where createdtime > (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * {{days}}))
| tolong(createdtime) as _messagetime
| timeslice by 1w 
//| timeToDetection / 3600 as timeToDetection
| timetoremediation as s
| pct(s,25,50,75) , min(s), max(s) by _timeslice

cat {{{lookup}}}
| where createdtime > (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 30))
| round(timetoresponse / (60 * 60),2) as h
| pct(h,50) as MTTResponse

cat {{{lookup}}}
| where createdtime > (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * {{days}}))
| tolong(createdtime) as _messagetime
| timeslice by 1w 
//| timeToDetection / 3600 as timeToDetection
|( timeassigned - createdtime) / 1000 as s
| pct(s,25,50,75) , min(s), max(s) by _timeslice

cat {{{lookup}}}
| where createdtime > (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 60)) and  createdtime < (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 30)) 
| round(timetoresponse / (60 * 60),2) as h
| pct(h,50) as MTTResponse

cat {{{lookup}}}
| where createdtime > (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 90)) and  createdtime < (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 60)) 
| round(timetoresponse / (60 * 60),2) as h
| pct(h,50) as MTTResponse

cat {{{lookup}}}
| where createdtime > (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 30))
| round(timetoremediation / (60 * 60),2) as h
| pct(h,50) as m

cat {{{lookup}}}
| where createdtime > (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 60)) and  createdtime < (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 30)) 
| round(timetoremediation / (60 * 60),2) as h
| pct(h,50) as m

cat {{{lookup}}}
| where createdtime > (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 90)) and  createdtime < (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 60)) 
| round(timetoremediation / (60 * 60),2) as h
| pct(h,50) as m

cat {{{lookup}}}
| where createdtime > (now () - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * {{days}}))
| tolong(createdtime) as _messagetime | timeslice 1w
| if( status= "closed",1,0) as closed
| count as insights, sum(closed) as closed by _timeslice | 100 * closed/insights as close_ratio | avg(close_ratio) by _timeslice

Insight Stats : Last {{days}} days (MTTX in Minutes)
Successfully Detected and Resolved Insights Last 30 Days (MTTX in Minutes)
